name: ProtEGGc
description:
ProtEGGc is a game where your mission is to protect the giant egg in the center of the complex!

Purchase weapons to do your job easier, summon peggdestals to have protection at any moment, and of course, proteggc the egg!

This game was originally made for Newgrounds July Jam 2021 with the theme of Egg, you can log in to Newgrounds and save your score in the leaderboard of the Newgrounds Page!

Timed Exclusive Update 0.3 WEAPON UPDATE:

  • Added 5 New Weapons
  • Added Shop
  • Made some improvements in animations
  • Music and SFX volume now saves
  • Balance: Soldiers don't attack the egg until they're near
  • Balance: Peggdestals no longer disappear after 2 minutes, BUT they're now limited(Resets after Shop time)
  • Desktop version for Windows, Linux, and Mac.
  • Desktop version: Funny Window Texts, lol
  • No sussy gun yet.

Play Newgrounds Version (This version will be outdated until game jam winners are announced, while the Itch.io version will include new content by the moment.)
